references.paper_title: Stable video diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets
references.reason: This paper is crucial as it introduces Stable Video Diffusion, the backbone for the HumanFixer model used in the HumanDreamer-X framework.

references.paper_title: 3D gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper is one of the most important because 3D Gaussian Splatting (3DGS) is used as the core 3D representation in HumanDreamer-X, providing the initial geometry and appearance prior.

references.paper_title: Pshuman: Photorealistic single-view human reconstruction using cross-scale diffusion
references.reason: It introduces PSHuman, a leading single-view human reconstruction approach that serves as a direct baseline for comparison and validation of HumanDreamer-X.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This is a seminal work on latent diffusion models, a key technology used in the video generation and restoration components of HumanDreamer-X.

references.paper_title: Smpl: A skinned multi-person linear model
references.reason: This paper introduces SMPL, which provides the 3D human model used to derive the initial point cloud for 3DGS-based reconstruction in HumanDreamer-X.
